DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : This study investigate feasibility harvesting , expand culture , freeze circulate tumor cell immune cell cancer patient healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Isolation Culture Immune Cells Circulating Tumor Cells From Peripheral Blood Leukopaks
DOC.criteria: Histological diagnosis metastatic stage IV locally advance ( unresectable ) stage III cancer solid tumor type . Patients may previously treat chemo naïve healthy volunteer Age > 18yo Life expectancy > 12 week ECOG Performance Status 0 , 1 , 2 , 3 ( Appendix 2 ) Screening laboratory value must meet following criterion : WBC ≥2000/µL Neutrophils ≥1500/µL Platelets > 100x103/µL Hemoglobin ≥8 g/dL Creatinine < 2.5 x ULN AST ≤2.5 x ULN without , ≤ 5 x ULN hepatic metastasis Bilirubin ≤2 x ULN ( except patient Gilbert 's syndrome , must total bilirubin < 3.0 mg/dL ) Primary Hematologic Malignancies ( leukemia , lymphoma ) Patients active infection require therapy ( fever , localize source ) exclude infection resolve . History , positive test HIV1 , HIV2 , HTLV1 serum antibody , hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C positive RNA Underlying medical condition , Principal Investigator 's treat oncologist 's opinion , obscure interpretation patient 's safety .
